== Contents: ==
The following functions are located in this package
=== Functions: ===
 ===== _string_ *`smarty_function_adminmenu`* ( _array_ `$params`, _Smarty_ `$smarty` ) =====
Show the admin menu
 ===== _string_ *`smarty_function_admintree`* ( _array_ `$params`, _Smarty_ `$smarty` ) =====
Show the admin tree
 ===== _void_ *`smarty_function_layout`* ( _array_ `$params`, _Smarty_ `$smarty` ) =====
Change the layout to be wrapped around the page
 ===== _string_ *`smarty_function_renderdebug`* ( _array_ `$params`, _Smarty_ `$smarty` ) =====
Show the debugger content
 ===== _int_ *`smarty_function_rendertime`* ( _array_ `$params`, _Smarty_ `$smarty` ) =====
Show the time it has taken for the site to render
 ===== _string_ *`smarty_function_search`* ( _array_ `$params`, _Smarty_ `$smarty` ) =====
Show a list of results on this page
